title: 実績バッジ2 - バックエンド
content:
[[iftags +コンポーネント・バックエンド]]
このユーザーコンポーネントのリファレンスは[[[reference:ta-badge|]]]です。
[[/iftags]]
[[div class="ta-badge"]]
[[div class="bg-frame frame-{$frame} bg-{$bg} bg-shadow-{$bg-shadow} plate-{$plate}" style="{$bg-img}"]]
[[div class="plate-badge"]]
[[div class="plate plate-shadow-{$plate-shadow}" style="{$plate-img}"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="badge-top {$badge-top}"]]
[[a class="{$badge-top-link}" href="{$badge-top-link}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="badge"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a1"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a2"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a3"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a4"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a5"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a6"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a7"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a8"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a9"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a10"]]
[[/div]]
[[/a]]
[[/div]][!--badge-top--]
[[div class="badge-right {$badge-right}"]]
[[a class="{$badge-right-link}" href="{$badge-right-link}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="badge"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a1"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a2"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a3"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a4"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a5"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a6"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a7"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a8"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a9"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a10"]]
[[/div]]
[[/a]]
[[/div]][!--badge-right--]
[[div class="badge-left {$badge-left}"]]
[[a class="{$badge-left-link}" href="{$badge-left-link}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="badge"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a1"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a2"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a3"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a4"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a5"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a6"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a7"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a8"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a9"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a10"]]
[[/div]]
[[/a]]
[[/div]][!--badge-left--]
[[/div]][!--plate-badge--]
[[div class="item-mobile-mode-{$item-mobile-mode} item-align-{$item-align}"]]
[[div class="item item-lt {$item-lt}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="transform: rotate({$item-lt-rotate}deg); background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="i_aa_p i_a1_p" style="max-width: none;"]]
[[div class="i_aa i_a1" style="transform: rotate({$item-lt-rotate}deg); {$item-lt-img}"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="i_aa_p i_a2_p" style="max-width: none;"]]
[[div class="i_aa i_a2" style="transform: rotate({$item-lt-rotate}deg);"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="i_aa_p i_a3_p" style="max-width: none;"]]
[[div class="i_aa i_a3" style="transform: rotate({$item-lt-rotate}deg);"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="item-text"]]
{$item-lt-text}
[[/div]]
[[a class="{$item-lt-link}" href="{$item-lt-link}"]]
[[/a]]
[[/div]][!--item-lt--]
[[div class="item item-lc {$item-lc}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="transform: rotate({$item-lc-rotate}deg); background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]][!--container--]
